citation.article-title: Reclassification of Vibrio fischeri, Vibrio logei, Vibrio salmonicida and Vibrio wodanis as Aliivibrio fischeri gen. nov., comb. nov., Aliivibrio logei comb. nov., Aliivibrio salmonicida comb. nov. and Aliivibrio wodanis comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Aliivibrio fischeri (Beijerinck 1889) comb. nov.
Basonym: Vibrio fischeri (Beijerinck 1889) Lehmann and Neumann 1896.
Other synonym: Photobacterium fischeri (Beijerinck 1889) Reichelt and Baumann 1973.
The description is the same as that given for Photobacterium fischeri by Reichelt & Baumann (1973) with the following additions.
Negative for the Voges–Proskauer (acetoin) test, indole production, gelatinase and agarolysis.
Resistant to carbenicillin (100 μg) and ampicillin (10 μg).
